description: T.1	Purple Leafed Plum - Crown lift to 2.5m above ground level.T.2	Crab Apple - Reduce from corner of neighbouring property to give 2m clearance. 	T.3	Purple Leafed Plum Crown lift to 2.5m above ground level removing secondary smaller stem.T.4	Cherry Laurel - Lateral reduction in line with pavement. G.5	Cotoneaster 'Cornubia' - Fell (Dying).T.6	Damson - Fell (Dying).T.7	Rowan - Fell (Dying).T.8	Cedar of Lebanon - Remove limbs to north, over sunken garden.T.9	Cedar of Lebanon - Remove limb to south, over wall.T.10	 Smoke bush - exempt (not a tree).
